mapper.sql: msg_id, msg_code, msg_type, msg_title, msg_time, msg_status, msg_publisher, msg_accepter
mapper.select: select a.*, b.talents_name AS msgPublisherName, c.talents_name AS msgAccepterName from msg_info a left join talents_info b on a.msg_publisher=b.code left join talents_info c on a.msg_accepter=c.code where msg_code = #{mesCode}
mapper.insert: insert into msg_info (msg_id, msg_code, msg_type, msg_title, msg_time, msg_status, msg_publisher, msg_accepter) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into msg_info
msg_id,
msg_code,
msg_type,
msg_title,
msg_time,
msg_status,
msg_publisher,
msg_accepter,
#{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update msg_info
msg_code = #{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_type = #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_title = #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_time = #{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_publisher = #{msgPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_accepter = #{msgAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update msg_info set msg_code = #{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_type = #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_title = #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_time = #{msgTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_publisher = #{msgPublisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_accepter = #{msgAccepter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
